snippet: Democrats and Republicans agree that there are compelling policy and political reasons to have Congress approve the president's declared war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Democrats and Republicans agree that there are compelling policy and political reasons to have Congress approve the president's declared war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.

headline.main: Congress Should Have a Say on ISIS
